Theta2DSettingsFiducial¶

class misfit.Theta2DSettingsFiducial(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: misfit.Theta2DSettings

Class to initialize the settings needed for the fitting parameters,
which is passed to the fitEmis2D object. Contains defaults for fiducial (arctan + const velocity dispersion) kinModel
Designed to have the Velocity profile parameters first, then Dispersion profile params, then
composite / other parameters (eg, spatial + wavelength shift)
